EmailTemplate.description: Email template for Opted out dealers - Manual assignment (unassigned leads)
EmailTemplate.name: Unassigned Leads - Dealer Email - Opt-out
EmailTemplate.subject: Notice of Lead Assignment - {!Account.Name}
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Notice of Lead Assignment
Dear {!Account.Opportunity_Recipient__c},
You are receiving this email in reference to our conversation about your acceptance of the following SunPower leads which were reassigned to {!Account.Name} from another dealer.
Please ensure contact within 45min with each lead:
(Paste lead list here including opportunity created date)
To update your lead(s) immediately, please follow these 3 easy steps:
Log on to the SunPower Partner Portal Go to Opportunities tab and select SunPower Leads from the dropdown. Open the lead that needs to be updated and change the Opportunity Stage to ‘Contacted’. Save your changes.
If you have any questions, please call 1-800-SUNPOWER or email us at customersupport@sunpowercorp.com.
Regards,
<Name>
SunPower Customer Support Team
www.sunpowercorp.com
1800-SUNPOWER ext. xxxxx
